articles.title: France fire: Children among 7 dead in suspected arson attack in Nice
articles.description: Seven people have died, including three children, in a fire that broke out in the early hours of Thursday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Germany plans to halve military aid for Ukraine
articles.description: Berlin says a G7 scheme to raise $50bn from interest on frozen Russian assets will ensure other funding.
articles.content:
